bike.description: Specialized FACT 10r carbon, FACT IS construction, uniquely shaped tapered 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, compact race design w/ Zertz inserts, internal cable routing, threaded BB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, full monocoque, Zertz inserts
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, w/ 8mm carbon cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
Specialized Pro, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert
Carbon chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
